description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Coal-Regions of America; their topography, geology and development. With a colored geological map of Pennsylvania ... and numerous other maps and illustrations" Author: MACFARLANE, James - A.M Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7104.c.21." Page: 121 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1873 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002313792 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
